com.mindfusion.scheduling.model

Class Style

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mindfusion.scheduling.model.Style

  • public class Style
extends java.lang.Object
    Specifies the appearance of calendar elements.

    • Method Detail

      • cloneShallow

        public Style cloneShallow()
        Description copied from class: Style
        Creates a shallow copy of this style.

        The members of the new style are initialized with the values of the current style without cloning them.

        Returns:
        A Style instance.
